mapper.sql: id, idfa, changTime, ip, bundleId, names, appStoreId, cusId, model, oss, taskId, r1, r2, callbacktime, r3, r4, r5, r6
mapper.select:
select count(*) as r5,r3 from sj_task_detail where r3 in(#{gIds}) and
r2 = 1
r2 is null
group by r3
mapper.delete: delete from sj_task_detail where taskId = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and idfa=#{idfa}
mapper.insert: insert into sj_task_detail (id, idfa, changTime, ip, bundleId, names, appStoreId, cusId, model, oss, taskId, r1, r2, callbacktime, r3, r4, r5, r6) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bundleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{names,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appstoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callbacktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r6,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
